utils.fhir

Class QueryBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.fhir.QueryBuilder

  • public class QueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to create a database Query from a FHIR SearchParameterMap

        public boolean recordOwnerReference(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String refType)
                             throws AppException
        Use a FHIR query parameter to restrict the record owner
        Parameters:
        name - name of FHIR search parameter
        refType - Resource referenced (Patient, Practitioner, ...)
        Throws:
        AppException
